name: Footistcs
desc: Footistics is your go-to source for in-depth football analytics and statistics.

name: American sign Language Detector
desc: An American Sign Language Detector is a technology that recognizes and interprets ASL gestures to facilitate communication between the deaf and hearing communities.

name: Dog Breed Identifier
desc: A dog breed identifier is a tool or app that recognizes and categorizes different dog breeds based on images or physical characteristics, helping users identify the breed of a dog.

name: Language Detector
desc: A language detector is a tool or algorithm designed to identify and determine the language in which a given text or speech is written or spoken.

name: Phone Comparator
desc: A phone comparator app is an application that allows users to compare and contrast the features, specifications to make you informed about purchasing decision

name: Hymnastic - A Music App
desc: Developed a music recommendation app using Java Spring Boot and Thymeleaf, integrated with the Spotify API to display listening activity and preferences. Enhanced user experience with tailored recommendations using machine learning models in Python, integrated via Jython. Efficiently managed user data and song metadata with a MySQL database.
